data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Urban Company Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 17 2025 the equity shares of Urban Company Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544515) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250916- dated September 16 2025.
